Name: Gorge
About the game: Gorge is a first-person puzzle-platformer game, where you use your telekinesis abilities on objects in order to create paths you can traverse using your parkour abilities. Solve your way through the red rock canyons & waterfalls, the debris scattered gorge, a cave system, a reservoir and a crumbling dam. A free, short game. Purchase the 'Special Features' pack to unlock extra features: - 7 Challenge Courses - Achievements - Appreciation from the solo-developer
Meta Title: Gorge: Oct 2, 2021, Boaz Leshman and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Gorge? Check out the release date (Oct 2, 2021), developer insights from Boaz Leshman, and a complete game summary.
